title: Can't download
body: I have been playing league of legends on this computer for years but after i downloaded the windows 10 update i cant open the game. i undownloaded it and tried to re download, but now i cant even start the installation. help please?

replies.body: What happens when you attempt to start the installation? If you could [provide me with a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of the error message you see, I can get a good understanding of what's going on.
ill start the installation press finish, so that its about to start installing and i get that message

Gotcha. So PvP.net patcher kernel errors are usually caused by League missing certain administrative privileges that it needs in order to operate properly. I strongly recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure League has been correctly configured.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
its downloading! thanks i really appreciate it
